short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download inline SVG files on right-click. Download as both SVG and PNG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily download SVG files from any webpage with a simple right-click! With SVG Downloader, you can quickly save SVG images as both SVG and PNG formats. Just right-click on the SVG you want, choose the format, and it's downloaded instantly to your device. Perfect for designers, developers, and anyone working with scalable vector graphics!

Features:

Download SVG files directly with a right-click.
Option to save as SVG or PNG format.
Fast, lightweight, and user-friendly.
